channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Winklevoss twins' crypto exchange Gemini to seek UAE crypto license
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The United-States-based cryptocurrency exchange is now seeking a UAE license and reportedly told local media there was "hostility and lack of clarity" on regulations in the U.S.

item.title: Japanese AI experts raise concern over bots trained on copyrighted material
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Takashi Kii, the Member of the House of Representatives for 10 Wards of Fukuoka indicated that he is pushing for regulation to protect copyright holders from being infringed on by AI.

item.title: Missing ‘Bitcoin Millionaire’ and ONFO coin co-creator found dead: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The body of Dr. John Forsyth has been found following a week-long search but police reportedly said foul play did not appear to be a factor.

item.title: Blackrock CEO issues dire warning over ‘debt ceiling drama’ — Bullish for Bitcoin?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The United States’ debt ceiling is one step closer to being raised, but Larry Fink says trust in the U.S. dollar is being eroded, which could be good news for Bitcoin.

item.title: Satoshi Nak-AI-moto: Bitcoin's creator has become an AI chatbot
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The bot is a ChatGPT model that’s so far only been trained on Satoshi Nakamoto’s public writings and a handful of Bitcoin-related source materials.

item.title: Investment bank TD Cowen shuts crypto unit a year after opening
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Days after Digital Currency Group's TradeBlock started winding down operations, investment bank TD Cowen has also announced its crypto unit's closure.

item.title: Stop shoving crypto ‘down people’s throats’ — Pudgy Penguins CEO on NFTs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Luca Netz suggested that Pudgy Penguins is pushing for Web3/blockchain as a “back end not front end” approach, as it makes its IP as accessible as possible.

item.title: Gate.io denies liquidity problems after Multichain CEO goes missing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Some Twitter users posted transactions showing large inflows of MULTI and FTM to Gate.io, leading them to perceive a connection between the two organizations.

item.title: SBF wants to subpoena documents from old FTX/Alameda law firm to use in his defense
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The prosecution and FTX debtors already have access to the documents, which concern 11 topics and may contain material favorable to SBF.

item.title: Microsoft’s CSO says AI will help humans flourish, cosigns doomsday letter anyway
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Eric Horvitz penned a blog post lauding the transformative nature of AI on the same day he cosigned a document warning it could threaten humanity’s very existence.

item.title: Pepecoin (PEPE) price action points to a potential 70% drop
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: A bearish chart pattern suggests that PEPE could shave off another 70% in value, especially if the wider market continues to trend down.

item.title: Sen. Elizabeth Warren points to crypto payments as facilitating fentanyl trade in China
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: “The number of crypto transactions associated with Chinese fentanyl brokers increased by 450% just last year alone," said the Massachusetts senator, citing an Elliptic report.

item.title: Multichain team cannot locate CEO, halts service for affected chains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Cross-chain services are suspended for Kekchain, Public Mint, DynoChain, Redlight Chain, Dexit, Ekta, HPB, Onus, Omax, Findora and Planq.

item.title: Tether expands reach in Georgia through investment in CityPay​.io
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The partnership seeks to enhance the payment industry in Georgia by introducing heightened efficiency.

item.title: EU officials sign Markets in Crypto-Assets framework into law
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: First introduced in 2020, MiCA aims to create a consistent regulatory framework for crypto assets among the European Union member states.

item.title: NFT collections take massive price hit in 2023: Nifty Newsletter, May 24–30
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The value of popular NFTs has sharply declined over the past year, with drops of up to 95%.

item.title: Fantom starts paying developers to generate gas fees
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Developers will get a 15% cut of the fees they generate, but only if their app has done more than 125,000 transactions and has existed for three months.

item.title: Web3 gaming gets competitive: QORPO Game Studio joins Cointelegraph Accelerator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: Web3 game developer QORPO Game Studio aims to introduce competitive esports to the Web3 gaming ecosystem.

item.title: Price analysis 5/31: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and most major altcoins are struggling to hold on to their higher levels, indicating that the bears have not given up yet.

item.title: Hong Kong Virtual Assets Consortium launched with Huobi as first member
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The new consortium will provide ratings of digital asset trading platforms and cryptocurrency market indexes when it becomes operational.

item.title: TRC-20 USDT circulation hits record high 5 years after Tron mainnet launch
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Over 60% of USDT's supply is currently issued on the Tron blockchain, according to Tether data.

item.title: Former House Rep blames industry outsiders for associating crypto with bank’s failure
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to Barney Frank, Signature Bank’s only issue prior to regulators seizing control in March was “crypto-fear-inaccurate withdrawals."

item.title: Bitcoin played second fiddle as KAVA, XRP, TRX, RPL and RNDR led the crypto market in May
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Bitcoin is about to close its worst-performing month since FTX collapsed, but a handful of altcoins posted noteworthy gains in May.

item.title: From cricket to crypto: AB de Villiers ventures into Web3
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: South African cricket icon AB de Villiers trades his bat for Web3 as he discusses his love affair with NFTs and a partnership with a novel Ethereum-based investment platform.

item.title: Binance plans new round of layoffs amid increased regulatory scrutiny
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Binance's chief strategy officer Patrick Hillmann hinted on Twitter the resource reorganization is meant to address growing regulatory pressures targeting the crypto space.

item.title: Bitcoin fragments could become more valuable than full Bitcoins
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Lugui Tillier
item.description: Collectors known as “sat hunters” are collecting satoshis from rare Bitcoin — and those fragments may eventually be worth more than regular Bitcoin.

item.title: Web3 developer Magic raises $52M in funding led by PayPal Ventures
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The company has raised $80 million for wallet development since its inception in 2020.

item.title: Bitcoin hodlers exited ‘capitulation’ above $20K, new metric hints
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Long-term holder spending is “seeking equilibrium,” Glassnode suggests — but nothing will be quiet for long.

item.title: EU, US should push for AI code of conduct: EU tech chief
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The EU tech chief spoke to members of the EU–U.S. Trade and Technology Council about the need for a voluntary code of conduct prior to the forthcoming laws.

item.title: Mad scientist’s NFTs degrade when they’re traded: 0xDEAFBEEF, NFT Creator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Greg Oakford
item.description: Self-proclaimed tinkerer 0xDEAFBEEF has hit it big with audiovisual NFTs that slowly degrade in quality every time they’re traded.
